title: 820-1949-A dead board
message: Board came in dead drawing only 5V, PPBUS is present, but PP3V3_G3H_RTC is not present, I checked U6903 it has it’s power which is PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3HRTC which is 12.3V and the enable signal CHGR_EN_ MVR_R is 5V, is it a good enable signal

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Any fault history, liquid sign?

"U6903 it has it’s power which is PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3HRTC"
Wrong assumption; U6903 power is PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3HRTC_R!
Don't you consider to check R6900???

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message: No history, board just came in dead, apologies I miss the last R because I took measurements on C6907 and C6906 which are connected to pin 2 of R6900 and they were good 12.3V just to double check my readings, what about the Enable signal CHGR_EN_MVR_R?? Is 5V a good one??

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
5V is good there.

Diode mode to ground at L6900?
If good, check R6910-13 and C6903/10.
If all good, then change U6903.

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Recap
Board came in dead drawing 5V, PPBUS is present and 12.3V,
 but PP3V3_G3H_RTC is not present,
 I checked U6903 it has it’s power which is PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H_RTC_R which is 12.3V and the enable signal CHGR_EN_ MVR_R is 5V, Which was also confirmed to be good by you. Changed IC U6903 and PP3V3_G3H_ RTC was present and board daws 20V from type c charger.
**Now the system came up but getting very hot and shot down( I guessed a thermal shot down) 
**I had to resit the board in the casing,
Now it’s just showing the apple logo without loading the progress bar
** I restored it with configurator 2, it was restored successfully 
** now  it’s stocked on internet recovery,is not loading any progress bar. Internet recovery is not loading

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Can you start Diagnostic mode?
Also try in safe mode.

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Recap
Board came in dead drawing 5V, PPBUS is present and 12.3V,
but PP3V3_G3H_RTC is not present,
I checked U6903 it has it’s power which is PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H_RTC_R which is 12.3V and the enable signal CHGR_EN_ MVR_R is 5V, Which was also confirmed to be good by you. Changed IC U6903 and PP3V3_G3H_ RTC was present and board daws 20V from type c charger.
**Now the system came up but getting very hot and shot down( I guessed a thermal shot down)
**I had to resit the board in the casing,
Now it’s just showing the apple logo without loading the progress bar
** I restored it with configurator 2, it was restored successfully
** now  it’s stocked on internet recovery,is not loading any progress bar. Internet recovery is not loading

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
after power button it goes straight in to internet mode and the internet mode is dragging.( very very slow)
I can’t start diagnostic mode and safe mode

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Start disconnecting cables from MLB, one by one; trackpad, touchbar, touch ID, etc.
See if at any moment progress bar appears.
You can disconnect even internal LCD, testing with external monitor.

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
I discovered I didn’t fix the battery well. So I have done the needful 
Now I got the internet recovery progress bar, but  The processor gets very hot  and the screen will goes blank with glitches on top of the screen. After like 2minutes 
In short the processor gets hot when the system is working well.

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Check if heatsink does its job; try known good one.
Both fans go to max then?

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
I have changed heat sink, still doing same thing.
 Fan not going to max, fan runs normal

title: 820-1949-A dead board
message:
Try again DFU restore.
Disconnect internal LCD and check if external video is affected too.

Check CPU temps with HWMonitor.
